item.title: 独家报道日元疲软为政治蒙上阴影，日本央行为近期加息做准备
item.description: 消息人士称，随着对日元暴跌的担忧重现，以及要求日本央行维持低利率的政治压力减弱，日本央行正在为最快下个月可能加息做准备，重拾此前的鹰派措辞。【原文：The Bank of Japan is preparing markets for a possible interest rate hike as soon as next month, sources say, reviving previous hawkish language as worries about sharp yen declines return and political pressure for the bank to keep rates low fades.】

item.title: 富士康获批在威斯康星州投资 5.69 亿美元
item.description: 台湾富士康周三表示，该公司已获得监管部门批准在美国威斯康星州追加 5.69 亿美元的投资。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn said on Wednesday that it has won regulatory approval for an additional $569 million investment in the U.S. state of Wisconsin.】

item.title: 据《信息》报道，OpenAI 预计，到 2030 年，至少有 2.2 亿人将为 ChatGPT 付费
item.description: 人工智能公司 OpenAI 预计，ChatGPT 每周至少有 2.2 亿用户会付费订阅。【原文：Artificial intelligence firm OpenAI has projected at least 220 million of ChatGPT weekly users will pay for a subscription, the Information reported on Tuesday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波音公司获得价值 24.7 亿美元的合同，为美国空军增购 15 架 KC-46A 加油机
item.description: 美国空军授予波音公司一份价值 24.7 亿美元的合同，增购 15 架 KC-46A 天马座空中加油机。【原文：The U.S. Air Force awarded Boeing a $2.47 billion contract for 15 additional KC-46A Pegasus aerial refueling tankers, the company announced on Tuesday in a release.】

item.title: 特朗普称中国国家主席习近平 "或多或少同意 "加快购买美国商品
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，他在周一的电话中向中国国家主席习近平施压，要求中国政府加快和增加对美国商品的购买，而中国领导人 "或多或少地同意了"。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that he pressed Chinese President Xi Jinping to accelerate and increase Beijing's purchases of U.S. goods during a phone call on Monday, and the Chinese leader had "more or less agreed."】

item.title: Venture Global 与东京燃气签署 20 年液化天然气供应协议
item.description: Venture Global 公司周二表示，该公司已与日本首都天然气供应商东京燃气公司签署了一份为期 20 年的销售和采购协议（SPA），从 2030 年起每年向其供应 100 万公吨液化天然气。【原文：Venture Global said on Tuesday it has signed a 20-year sales and purchase agreement, or SPA, with Japan's capital city gas supplier, Tokyo Gas , to supply it with 1 million metric tonnes per annum of liquefied natural gas, starting in 2030.】

item.title: Workday 季度订阅收入冷淡，股价下跌
item.description: Workday 周二公布的第三季度订阅收入与华尔街预期一致，表明需求疲软，股价在盘后交易中下跌近 7%。【原文：Workday reported third-quarter subscription revenue in line with Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, signaling softer demand and sending its shares down nearly 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Optus 公司遭遇紧急呼叫中断
item.description: 澳大利亚电信公司 Optus 周三表示，该公司在墨尔本附近遭遇了一次紧急呼叫中断，影响了约 1.4 万用户。【原文：Australian telco Optus said on Wednesday it had suffered an emergency call outage near Melbourne impacting around 14,000 users, two months after a broader disruption that probably caused four deaths when customers failed to get timely aid.】

item.title: 网络安全需求强劲，Zscaler 季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 受云计算和人工智能安全解决方案强劲需求的推动，Zscaler 周四公布的季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Zscaler beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue and profit on Thursday, driven by strong demand for its cloud and artificial intelligence security solutions.】

item.title: 五角大楼利用太空部队新合同推进金顶导弹防御系统
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，美国太空部队已授予约半打小型 "金顶 "合同，以建造相互竞争的导弹防御原型机，从而拉开了未来价值数百亿美元的交易竞赛的序幕。【原文：The U.S. Space Force has awarded about a half dozen small Golden Dome contracts to build competing missile defense prototypes, kicking off a race for future deals worth tens of billions of dollars, according to two sources briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 五角大楼称波音公司获得 70 多亿美元军事合同
item.description: 五角大楼周二表示，美国军方已授予波音公司两份价值超过 70 亿美元的合同。【原文：The U.S. military has awarded Boeing two contracts valued at over $7 billion, the Pentagon said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿波罗等公司在美国反垄断诉讼中被控阻止债务再融资
item.description: 阿波罗资本管理公司（Apollo Capital Management）、贝莱德集团（BlackRock）和其他六家金融公司周二在曼哈顿联邦法院遭到宽带供应商优步通信公司（Optimum Communications）的起诉，后者指控这些公司串通一气，阻止其对数十亿美元的债务进行再融资。【原文：Apollo Capital Management , BlackRock and six other financial firms were sued on Tuesday in federal court in Manhattan by broadband provider Optimum Communications, which accused them of colluding to block it from refinancing billions of dollars in debt.】

item.title: 肉类包装商 JBS 同意将其皮革资产与 Viva 的资产合并
item.description: 巴西肉类加工企业 JBS 周二表示，它已与 Viva 公司的股东签署了一份具有约束力的谅解备忘录，以合并两家公司与皮革生产和商业化相关的资产。【原文：Brazilian meatpacker JBS said on Tuesday it had signed a binding memorandum of understanding with the shareholders of Viva to combine both firms' assets related to leather production and commercialization.】

item.title: 欧特克预计季度业绩高于预期，主要得益于云订购和人工智能设计工具的需求
item.description: 设计软件制造商欧特克（Autodesk）周二预计，第四季度收入和利润将高于华尔街预期，主要得益于稳定的续订和对其基于云的设计工具需求的增长。【原文：Design software maker Autodesk forecast fourth-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, supported by steady subscription renewals and growing demand for its cloud-based design tools.】

item.title: 交易日 美联储乐观，感恩节周
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 数据存储需求强劲，NetApp 季度业绩超预期
item.description: 受数据存储服务和人工智能应用中使用的全闪存存储产品需求强劲的帮助，NetApp 周二公布的第二季度利润和营收超出华尔街预期。【原文：NetApp beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit and revenue on Tuesday, helped by strong demand for its data storage services and all-flash storage products used in artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，阿克曼的潘兴公司计划为封闭式基金进行 50 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，亿万富翁投资者比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）正计划通过其封闭式基金在美国上市融资 50 亿美元。【原文：Billionaire investor Bill Ackman is aiming to raise $5 billion through the U.S. listing of his closed-end fund, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people with knowledge of the offering.】

item.title: 惠普将在 2028 年前裁员约 6000 人，加大人工智能力度
item.description: 惠普公司周二表示，预计到2028财年将在全球范围内裁员4000至6000人，作为精简运营和采用人工智能加速产品开发、提高客户满意度和生产率计划的一部分。【原文：HP Inc said on Tuesday it expects to cut between 4,000 and 6,000 jobs globally by fiscal 2028 as part of a plan to streamline operations and adopt artificial intelligence to speed up product development, improve customer satisfaction and boost productivity.】

item.title: 戴尔预测增长目标乐观，因人工智能服务器销售强劲
item.description: 戴尔公司周二预计，第四季度营收和利润将高于华尔街预期，原因是为支持人工智能应用而对数据中心不断增加的投资促进了对其服务器的需求。【原文：Dell forecast fourth-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as increasing investments in data centers to support artificial intelligence applications boost demand for its servers.】

item.title: 美国财政部长抨击美联储的利率控制系统
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，美联储的利率管理制度举步维艰，需要简化。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday the Federal Reserve's system of managing interest rates is struggling and needs to be simplified.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，华纳兄弟发现公司寻求在 12 月 1 日前提高出价
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，华纳兄弟发现公司已要求潜在买家在 12 月 1 日前提交改进后的报价。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery has asked potential buyers to submit improved offers by December 1, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华纳音乐集团与 Suno 就人工智能音乐授权版权案达成和解
item.description: 华纳音乐集团（Warner Music Group）与人工智能歌曲创作平台 Suno 就版权侵权案达成和解。【原文：Warner Music Group settled its copyright infringement case with artificial intelligence-powered song creation platform Suno, enabling the startup to launch licensed AI models next year, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空地勤人员寻求工会投票，IAM 表示
item.description: 国际机械师和航空航天工人协会（IAM）周二表示，它将为约 3000 名捷蓝航空地面工人申请工会代表选举。【原文：The International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM) said on Tuesday it will file for union representation election covering about 3,000 JetBlue ground workers.】

item.title: 劳氏公司因违规使用含铅涂料被罚 1250 万美元
item.description: 美国司法部和环境保护局周二宣布，劳氏公司将支付 1250 万美元的罚款，以解决美国政府对其在房屋装修过程中违规使用含铅涂料的指控。【原文：Lowe's will pay a $12.5 million penalty to resolve U.S. government accusations of lead paint violations during home renovations, the Department of Justice and the Environmental Protection Agency announced on Tuesday.】

item.title: Robinhood 首席执行官的数学人工智能初创公司 Harmonic 在最新融资中估值 14.5 亿美元
item.description: Harmonic是一家人工智能初创公司，由Robinhood首席执行官弗拉德-特涅夫（Vlad Tenev）联合创办，该公司通过提高推理能力来解决人工智能 "幻觉"（即不正确或无意义的答案）问题，已筹集到1.2亿美元新资金，估值达14.5亿美元。【原文：Harmonic, an artificial intelligence startup co-founded by Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev, has raised $120 million in new funding, valuing the company at $1.45 billion, as it tackles AI "hallucinations" — or incorrect or nonsensical answers — by improving the ability to reason.】

item.title: 美国法官批准 Elliott 关联公司竞购 Citgo 石油公司母公司
item.description: 周二，一名美国法官采纳了一项建议，批准埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的一家附属公司在法院组织的 Citgo Petroleum 母公司拍卖中以 59 亿美元的价格竞标，为下令出售这家美国第七大炼油商扫清了道路。【原文：A U.S. judge on Tuesday adopted a recommendation for the approval of a $5.9 billion bid from an affiliate of Elliott Investment Management in the court-organized auction of Citgo Petroleum's parent, clearing the way to order the sale of the seventh largest U.S. refiner.】

item.title: 数十位州检察长敦促美国国会不要阻止人工智能法律的实施
item.description: 来自 35 个州和哥伦比亚特区的共和党和民主党总检察长周二敦促国会领导人不要阻止各州制定有关人工智能的法律，并警告说，如果对人工智能技术放任不管，将会产生 "灾难性后果"。【原文：Republican and Democratic attorneys general from 35 states and the District of Columbia urged congressional leaders on Tuesday not to block state laws governing artificial intelligence, warning of "disastrous consequences" if the technology is left unregulated.】

item.title: 美国 10 月预算赤字 2840 亿美元；报告受停摆影响
item.description: 美国财政部周二表示，美国政府公布的 10 月份赤字增加了 2840 亿美元，该报告因联邦政府最近关门而推迟发布并受到影响，反映出创纪录的关税收入被 11 月份的一些福利支付转入上个月的数据所抵消。【原文：The U.S. government posted a higher $284 billion deficit for October in a report delayed and impacted by the recent federal government shutdown and which reflected record tariff revenues offset by a shift of some November benefit payments into last month's data, the Treasury Department said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 标普全球将 Under Armour 的评级列入下调观察名单
item.description: 信用评级机构S&P Global周二将运动服装公司Under Armour的评级列入可能下调的观察名单。【原文：Credit rating agency S&P Global on Tuesday placed sportswear company Under Armour's ratings on watch for potential downgrades.】

item.title: 美国交通部长希望航班上的零食更健康
item.description: 美国运输部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）希望航空公司放弃含盐的椒盐卷饼和高热量的饼干，转而在机上提供更健康的选择。【原文：U.S. Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy wants airlines to ditch salty pretzels and calorie-laden cookies in favor of on-board healthier options.】
